message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a very competitive price of $110. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though - how about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
